title: Hybrid Instructional Design Process for Enhancing Critical Thinking in Healthcare Policy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of healthcare systems and foundational policy analysis concepts
context.additional_context: A learning environment integrating VR simulation-based policy decision scenarios with e-learning platforms.

learning_goals: Learners enhance logical reasoning and problem-solving skills through healthcare policy case analysis
Learners achieve 80%+ participation rates and engagement levels in policy simulations within hybrid learning environments
Learners improve evaluation scores by 15% by applying critical thinking tools (CCTDI scale) to policy decision-making processes
Learners are assessed on their ability to develop policy advocacy strategies through team-based VR simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
